TextBlock.Text: HYACINTH: I've found a spot where there is no exposure to the vacuum of space, great! Now, there's a lot that happened.
HYACINTH: I flew towards that shadow I saw eclipsing the sun, and this huge spaceship shows itself! Suppose this species created a cloaking field!
HYACINTH: Their landing bay was easy to spot, but my ship lacks eyes, so I had to keep it out there.
HYACINTH: Most curious of all, there is this green glass in some of these structures, and they react to light of any kind.
HYACINTH: There is also an interface I can test, as I will momentarily.
